Module: data/google-sheet-adapter

A module for reading the data from a Google Sheet following a predefined template.

Methods

<static> get(data, field)

Extracts a field from a Google Sheet-JSON-formatted line.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
data Object the JSON entry to extract data from
field string the field to extract
Returns:
the extracted data
Type
string

<static> getBool(data, field, mandatory)

Extracts a boolean field from a Google Sheet-JSON-formatted line.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
data Object the JSON entry to extract data from
field string the field to extract
mandatory boolean whether the result is mandatory or not; if true, the function will return false for an undefined value; otherwise, it will return null
Returns:
the extracted data
Type
boolean

<static> getCsv(data, field)

Extracts a field as an array of strings from a Google Sheet-JSON-formatted line.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
data Object the JSON entry to extract data from
field string the field to extract
Returns:
the extracted data
Type
Array.<string>

<static> getInt(data, field)

Extracts an integer field from a Google Sheet-JSON-formatted line.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
data Object the JSON entry to extract data from
field string the field to extract
Returns:
the extracted data
Type
number

<static> getMinMax(data, field)

Extracts a pair of fields as a min-max object from a Google Sheet-JSON-formatted line.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
data Object the JSON entry to extract data from
field string the field to extract
Returns:
the extracted data
Type
Object

<static> getSheetAsJsonUrl(sheetId)

Returns the URL to the JSON version of a Google Sheet based on its Google ID.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
sheetId string the ID of the Google Sheet
Returns:
the URL to the JSON version of the Google Sheet or undefined if no ID was provided
Type
string
